Package src

Class Book

java.lang.Object
src.Book
public class Book extends Object
Represents a book in the library system.

  • Constructor Summary

    • Book

      public Book(String title, Author author, String ISBN, String publisher, int numCopies)
      Constructs a book with the given details.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book.
      author - The author of the book.
      ISBN - The ISBN (International Standard Book Number) of the book.
      publisher - The publisher of the book.
      numCopies - The number of copies available for the book.
